text:
Hello! Does anyone know if there is a way to re-create the dropdown menu that appears when setting the due date while creating a task?

I’d like to create a custom deal property where sales reps can set the ‘call back date’ using a dropdown like that dropdown.

I don’t think the task schema is editable. I was attempting to make changes to the task creation form yesterday via API and got this response:

`{`
  `"status": "error",`
  `"message": "Cannot modify HubSpot defined object type",`
  `"correlationId": "813c918a-6ed6-41d5-84f7-cfff6840b5fd",`
  `"category": "VALIDATION_ERROR",`
  `"subCategory": "ObjectSchemaError.CANNOT_MODIFY_HubSpot_DEFINED_OBJECT_TYPE"`
`}`
can i change my primary language if i already set to different language ?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
